title: Embroidered Picture, 17th century
medium:
Medium: silk, metallic, glass
Technique: embroidery and stump work on satin ground
creditline: Gift of Anonymous Donor from the Fraser/Martin Collection
description: In center, two women holding a shield or crest, surrounded by various figures.   Top center, the sun; to the left, a fruit tree and a woman holding a snake; to the right, a flowering vine and a woman holding a flower.  Bottom center an old man leaning on a staff; to left a man and woman; to right a woman and two children under an arbor.

tombstone.epitaph:
Embroidered Picture, 17th century.
17th century. Medium: silk, metallic, glass
Technique: embroidery and stump work on satin ground. Gift of Anonymous Donor from the Fraser/Martin Collection. 1974-100-3.
